review: I had a splendid experience with Dr Smita Pawar. She explained each and every aspect of the scan and was extremely friendly and made me feel extremely comfortable :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: She explained the things and development of baby very well..and we will be so happy to visit her again in next scan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
She explained everything elaborately and while doing my check up ..she made sure that I feel comfortable and relaxed 

She’s friendly and super amazing!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Smita Pawar is just amazing, she is warm and humble in her approach. Wouldn’t want to consult any other doctor after consulting her : )

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: During my pregnancy for nine months, dr Smita Pawar has done all my scans. We were made to do every single one there was. She was very thorough in her explanations during this time. However I delivered a baby girl. A beautiful baby girl. One week after she was born we found out that she had a heart condition and a MAjOR one. It’s called complete AV Canal defect. **** *** *** ******** ****** *** ** *** ***** **** ** ** ****** I have consulted many many Doctors.* *** *** **** *** ** ** *** *** **** *** ****** ** *** ** *** ***** ** We blindly trust in our doctors cos we believe that thy have our best interest. But no. That’s not the case with this hospital CLoUdNine. And dr Pawar. They charge us over the moon and make us do all of the scans and we are happy to. Cos we want the best for our child but at what cost ?? **** * ****** *** ** ** ****** ** ****** ******* *** ** **** *** ** ** **** ******* *** ***** *** ** ** *** ********* ** ***** ** ******** **** ********* **** * ***** ******** ** *** ***** ** **** *********** **** *** ** **** * ******** It’s not a small thing gone amiss! Today my daughter has undergone a heart surgery and So my point of writing this is that I hope this never happens to any one ever again Doctor SMITA and cloudnine hospItals. ! And parents pls consult at your own risk.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** **** ****** * **** *** ** ** ******i always thought cloudnine is very expensive and I wil never prefer but meeting such a finest and sweet doctor I guess I can consider cloudnine..  Thank you so much doc Smita :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr.Smita is very composed and content with her patients , explains in detail with a positive approach. We had a great experience consulting her for my foetal NT scan.

All my pregnancy scans are done by Dr. Smita Pawar at Cloudnine. 

She is very friendly and makes you feel comfortable.  

She gives you an explanation for everything that she does during the scan!

Will recommend her!
